data.title: Very good pizza, free delivery, huge and diverse menu.
data.text:
I like Grand pizza because it crosses so many ethnic flavors and it's pretty good food.
Is it Greek, Italian, Mexican, or Spanish food? But whatever you're in the mood for, this place probably has it.
Greek souvlaki, gyros, Mexican tortas or tacos, burritos, nachos.
Or if you want camarones, or club sandwiches, or hot and cold grinders. Everything is here to satisfy every taste.
Oh, they have pretty good pizza with any topping. 
I tried their Mexican pizza. Beans, onions,hot chili sauce and special spiced pork. Awesome!
Next visit, I'll try the calzone with a house salad.
They usually have the 2 pie special with free soda or a large cheese pizza with mozzarella sticks or hot wings.
Either way, you'll like this place.
And Del Prete Italian bakery is next door so you'll want canoli's to top off the meal.
Mangia!
